name: UpdateCompensationScorecard
description:
Update an existing compensation scorecard.

Use this tool to update an existing compensation scorecard as of a specified effective date. You can modify the scorecard name, description, inactive status, and manage goals and profiles within the scorecard. Ensure you fetch the current scorecard data first using GET /scorecards/{ID} to populate the request body with existing data.

parameters.name: resource_workday_id
parameters.description: The unique Workday ID for the compensation scorecard to be updated.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

parameters.name: compensation_scorecard_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing updated scorecard details. Includes fields like scorecardName, scorecardDescription, inactive status, defaultScorecardGoals, scorecardProfiles, and profileScorecardGoals.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Workday API

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
